articles.title: EU agrees deal with Britain to extend grace period in ‘sausage war’ - The Irish Times
articles.description: European Commission announces easing of several aspects of NI protocol
articles.content: The EU and Britain have announced a temporary deal that will allow uncooked meats to flow into Northern Ireland for an extra three months alongside a number of other post-Brexit tweaks, following a d… [+6247 chars]

articles.title: Is there methane on Mars? Scientists close to solving mystery of the gas on Red Planet - India Today
articles.description: While the Curiosity rover had identified methane on the surface, Europe's orbiter hovering over it could not notice any trace in the atmosphere.
articles.content: When it comes to the search of ancient microbial life beyond Earth, Mars has been the closest to having traces of gases and conditions that might support the activity. However, one such gas has puzzl… [+3374 chars]

articles.title: GTP Headlines Poll: 7 in 10 Europeans will Travel for Holidays this Year | GTP Headlines - GTP Headlines
articles.description: A new Euronews poll shows that seven in ten Europeans will travel for holidays this year and four in five are willing to carry vaccine passports for international travel.
articles.content:
